remarks: Lemma for ~ dvfsumrlim .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2016.)
statement:
dvfsum.s $e |- S = ( T (,) +oo ) $.
dvfsum.z $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
dvfsum.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
dvfsum.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
dvfsum.md $e |- ( ph -> M <_ ( D + 1 ) ) $.
dvfsum.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. RR ) $.
dvfsum.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> A e. RR ) $.
dvfsum.b1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> B e. V ) $.
dvfsum.b2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. Z ) -> B e. RR ) $.
dvfsum.b3 $e |- ( ph -> ( RR _D ( x e. S |-> A ) ) = ( x e. S |-> B ) ) $.
dvfsum.c $e |- ( x = k -> B = C ) $.
dvfsum.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. RR* ) $.
dvfsum.l $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ k e. S ) /\ ( D <_ x /\ x <_ k /\ k <_ U ) ) -> C <_ B ) $.
dvfsumlem4.g $e |- G = ( x e. S |-> ( sum_ k e. ( M ... ( |_ ` x ) ) C - A ) ) $.
dvfsumlem4.0 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ D <_ x /\ x <_ U ) ) -> 0 <_ B ) $.
dvfsumlem4.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
dvfsumlem4.2 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. S ) $.
dvfsumlem4.3 $e |- ( ph -> D <_ X ) $.
dvfsumlem4.4 $e |- ( ph -> X <_ Y ) $.
dvfsumlem4.5 $e |- ( ph -> Y <_ U ) $.
dvfsumlem4 $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( ( G ` Y ) - ( G ` X ) ) ) <_ [_ X / x ]_ B ) $.
